title: React Bootcamp
objectives: To build a solid foundation in React to master advanced real-world React
curriculum:
-Thinking in React, Modern JavaScript, Routing & Data Fetching
-Forms, Authentication, and Hooks
-Redux Fundamentals, deployment to production
-Advanced React patterns and performance.
-GraphQL 101 & Real-World Testing in React.
-Building a UI component library

title: React Fundamentals
objectives: To have a solid foundation in React and its programming model
curriculum:
-Thinking in React, Modern JavaScript, Routing & Data Fetching
-Forms, Authentication, and Hooks
-Redux Fundamentals, deployment to production

title: Advanced React
curriculum:
-Advanced React patterns and performance.
-GraphQL 101 & Real-World Testing in React.
-Building a UI component library
